devdoc.author: Enzyme Council <security@enzyme.finance>
devdoc.details: This contract contains several "live" value calculations, which for this release are simply aliases to their "canonical" value counterparts since the only primitive price feed (Chainlink) is immutable in this contract and only has one type of value. Including the "live" versions of functions only serves as a placeholder for infrastructural components and plugins (e.g., policies) to explicitly define the types of values that they should (and will) be using in a future release.

calcCanonicalAssetValue(address,uint256,.details: Does not alter protocol state, but not a view because calls to price feeds can potentially update third party state

params._amount: The amount of the _baseAsset to convert
params._baseAsset: The asset from which to convert
params._quoteAsset: The asset to which to convert

returns.isValid_: True if the price feed rates used to derive value are all valid

calcCanonicalAssetsTotalValue(address[],.details: Does not alter protocol state, but not a view because calls to price feeds can potentially update third party state

params._amounts: The amounts of the _baseAssets to convert
params._quoteAsset: The asset to which to convert

returns.isValid_: True if the price feed rates used to derive value are all valid
returns.value_: The sum value of _baseAssets, denominated in the _quoteAsset

devdoc.title: ValueInterpreter Contract

calcCanonicalAssetValue(address,uint256,.notice: Calculates the value of a given amount of one asset in terms of another asset

calcCanonicalAssetsTotalValue(address[],.notice: Calculates the total value of given amounts of assets in a single quote asset

userdoc.notice: Interprets price feeds to provide covert value between asset pairs
